verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> [was] twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years אָחָ֣ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וְשֵׁשׁ־ <S%H8337><s%> six עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <S%H6240><s%> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not עָשָׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> but he did הַיָּשָׁ֛ר <S%H3477><s%> not [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּדָוִ֥יד <S%H1732><s%> like David אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> his father

וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> walked בְּדַרְכֵ֖י <S%H1870><s%> the ways מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְגַ֧ם <S%H1571><s%> also מַסֵּכ֛וֹת <S%H4541><s%> also molten images עָשָׂ֖ה <S%H6213><s%> and made לַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <S%H1168><s%> for Baalim

וְה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הִקְטִ֖יר <S%H6999><s%> Moreover he burnt incense בְּגֵ֣יא <S%H1516><s%> in the valley בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> of the son הִנֹּ֑ם <S%H2011><s%> of Hinnom וַיַּבְעֵ֤ר <S%H1197><s%> and burnt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בָּנָיו֙ <S%H1121><s%> his children בָּאֵ֔שׁ <S%H784><s%> in the fire כְּתֹֽעֲבוֹת֙ <S%H8441><s%> after the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> whom הֹרִ֣ישׁ <S%H3068><s%> whom the LORD יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3423><s%> had cast out מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיְזַבֵּ֧חַ <S%H2076><s%> He sacrificed וַיְקַטֵּ֛ר <S%H6999><s%> also and burnt incense בַּבָּמ֖וֹת <S%H1116><s%> in the high places וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגְּבָע֑וֹת <S%H1389><s%> and on the hills וְתַ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> and under כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עֵ֥ץ <S%H6086><s%> tree רַעֲנָֽן׃ <S%H7488><s%> and under every green

וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֜הוּ <S%H5414><s%> delivered יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Wherefore the LORD אֱלֹהָיו֮ <S%H430><s%> his God בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> him into the hand מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֲרָם֒ <S%H758><s%> of Syria וַיַּ֨כּוּ־ <S%H5221><s%> and they smote ב֔וֹ וַיִּשְׁבּ֤וּ <S%H7617><s%> him and carried away מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <S%H4480><s%> number שִׁבְיָ֣ה <S%H7633><s%> of them captives גְדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> a great multitude וַיָּבִ֖יאוּ <S%H935><s%> and brought דַּרְמָ֑שֶׂק <S%H1834><s%> [them] to Damascus וְ֠גַם <S%H1571><s%> was also בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> into the hand מֶ֤לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נִתָּ֔ן <S%H5414><s%> And he was also delivered וַיַּךְ־ <S%H5221><s%> who smote בּ֖וֹ מַכָּ֥ה <S%H4347><s%> slaughter גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> him with a great ס

וַיַּהֲרֹג֩ <S%H2026><s%> slew פֶּ֨קַח <S%H6492><s%> For Pekah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son רְמַלְיָ֜הוּ <S%H7425><s%> of Remaliah בִּֽיהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> in Judah מֵאָ֨ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> and twenty אֶ֛לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand בְּי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day אֶחָ֖ד <S%H259><s%> in one הַכֹּ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> men חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> [which were] all valiant בְּעָזְבָ֕ם <S%H5800><s%> because they had forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1><s%> of their fathers

וַֽיַּהֲרֹ֞ג <S%H2026><s%> slew זִכְרִ֣י ׀ <S%H2147><s%> And Zichri גִּבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> a mighty man אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַעֲשֵׂיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4641><s%> Maaseiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king's וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עַזְרִיקָ֖ם <S%H5840><s%> and Azrikam נְגִ֣יד <S%H5057><s%> the governor הַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> of the house וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֶלְקָנָ֖ה <S%H511><s%> and Elkanah מִשְׁנֵ֥ה <S%H4932><s%> [that was] next הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> to the king ס

וַיִּשְׁבּוּ֩ <S%H7617><s%> carried away captive בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel מֵֽאֲחֵיהֶ֜ם <S%H251><s%> of their brethren מָאתַ֣יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred אֶ֗לֶף <S%H505><s%> thousand נָשִׁים֙ <S%H802><s%> women בָּנִ֣ים <S%H1121><s%> sons וּבָנ֔וֹת <S%H1323><s%> and daughters וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> also שָׁלָ֥ל <S%H7998><s%> spoil רָ֖ב <S%H7227><s%> much בָּזְז֣וּ <S%H962><s%> and took also away מֵהֶ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> them וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <S%H935><s%> from them and brought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשָּׁלָ֖ל <S%H7998><s%> the spoil לְשֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> to Samaria ס

וְ֠שָׁם <S%H8033><s%> was there הָיָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become נָבִ֥יא <S%H5030><s%> But a prophet לַֽיהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD עֹדֵ֣ד <S%H5752><s%> [was] Oded שְׁמוֹ֒ <S%H8034><s%> was there whose name וַיֵּצֵ֗א <S%H3318><s%> and he went out לִפְנֵ֤י <S%H6440><s%> before הַצָּבָא֙ <S%H6635><s%> the host הַבָּ֣א <S%H935><s%> that came לְשֹׁמְר֔וֹן <S%H8111><s%> to Samaria וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָהֶ֗ם הִ֠נֵּה <S%H2009><s%> Behold בַּחֲמַ֨ת <S%H2534><s%> was wroth יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> unto them Behold because the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <S%H430><s%> God אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <S%H1><s%> of your fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> with Judah נְתָנָ֣ם <S%H5414><s%> he hath delivered בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> them into your hand וַתַּֽהַרְגוּ־ <S%H2026><s%> and ye have slain בָ֣ם בְזַ֔עַף <S%H2197><s%> them in a rage עַ֥ד <S%H5704><s%> has even לַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <S%H8064><s%> unto heaven הִגִּֽיעַ׃ <S%H5060><s%> [that] reacheth up

וְ֠עַתָּה <S%H6258><s%> Now בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <S%H3389><s%> and Jerusalem אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you אֹמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> And now ye purpose לִכְבֹּ֛שׁ <S%H3533><s%> to keep under לַעֲבָדִ֥ים <S%H5650><s%> for bondmen וְלִשְׁפָח֖וֹת <S%H8198><s%> and bondwomen לָכֶ֑ם הֲלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not רַק־ <S%H7535><s%> unto you [but are there] not with you even אַתֶּם֙ <S%H859><s%> you עִמָּכֶ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> of your own אֲשָׁמ֔וֹת <S%H819><s%> with you sins לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> angels

וְעַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now שְׁמָע֔וּנִי <S%H8085><s%> Now hear וְהָשִׁ֙יבוּ֙ <S%H7725><s%> me therefore and deliver הַשִּׁבְיָ֔ה <S%H7633><s%> the captives אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whom שְׁבִיתֶ֖ם <S%H7617><s%> again which ye have taken captive מֵאֲחֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H251><s%> of your brethren כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> for חֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> for the fierce אַף־ <S%H639><s%> wrath יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> is against ס

וַיָּקֻ֨מוּ <S%H6965><s%> stood up אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <S%H376><s%> some מֵרָאשֵׁ֣י <S%H7218><s%> of the heads בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children אֶפְרַ֗יִם <S%H669><s%> of Ephraim עֲזַרְיָ֤הוּ <S%H5838><s%> Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהֽוֹחָנָן֙ <S%H3076><s%> of Johanan בֶּרֶכְיָ֣הוּ <S%H1296><s%> Berechiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְשִׁלֵּמ֔וֹת <S%H4919><s%> of Meshillemoth וִֽיחִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H3169><s%> and Jehizkiah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son שַׁלֻּ֔ם <S%H7967><s%> of Shallum וַעֲמָשָׂ֖א <S%H6021><s%> and Amasa בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חַדְלָ֑י <S%H2311><s%> of Hadlai עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> against them that came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצָּבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> from the war

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <S%H559><s%> And said לָהֶ֗ם לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> must not תָבִ֤יאוּ <S%H935><s%> unto them Ye shall not bring in אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשִּׁבְיָה֙ <S%H7633><s%> the captives הֵ֔נָּה <S%H2008><s%> here כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for לְאַשְׁמַ֨ת <S%H819><s%> hither for whereas we have offended יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H5921><s%> is against אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you אֹמְרִ֔ים <S%H559><s%> [already] ye intend לְהֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> to add עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is against חַטֹּאתֵ֖ינוּ <S%H2403><s%> [more] to our sins וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is against אַשְׁמָתֵ֑ינוּ <S%H819><s%> and to our trespass כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for רַבָּ֤ה <S%H7227><s%> is great אַשְׁמָה֙ <S%H819><s%> for our trespass לָ֔נוּ וַחֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> and [there is] fierce אָ֖ף <S%H639><s%> wrath עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is against יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> against Israel ס

וַיַּעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> left הֶֽחָל֗וּץ <S%H2502><s%> So the armed men אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַשִּׁבְיָה֙ <S%H7633><s%> the captives וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבִּזָּ֔ה <S%H961><s%> and the spoil לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> the princes וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַקָּהָֽל׃ <S%H6951><s%> and all the congregation

וַיָּקֻ֣מוּ <S%H6965><s%> rose up הָאֲנָשִׁים֩ <S%H376><s%> the men אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who נִקְּב֨וּ <S%H5344><s%> which were expressed בְשֵׁמ֜וֹת <S%H8034><s%> by name וַיַּחֲזִ֣יקוּ <S%H2388><s%> and took בַשִּׁבְיָ֗ה <S%H7633><s%> the captives וְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַעֲרֻמֵּיהֶם֮ <S%H4636><s%> all that were naked הִלְבִּ֣ישׁוּ <S%H3847><s%> clothed מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשָּׁלָל֒ <S%H7998><s%> and with the spoil וַיַּלְבִּשׁ֣וּם <S%H3847><s%> among them and arrayed וַ֠יַּנְעִלוּם <S%H5274><s%> them and shod וַיַּאֲכִל֨וּם <S%H398><s%> them and gave them to eat וַיַּשְׁק֜וּם <S%H8248><s%> and to drink וַיְסֻכ֗וּם <S%H5480><s%> and anointed וַיְנַהֲל֤וּם <S%H5095><s%> them and carried בַּחֲמֹרִים֙ <S%H2543><s%> of them upon asses לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כּוֹשֵׁ֔ל <S%H3782><s%> all the feeble וַיְבִיא֛וּם <S%H935><s%> and brought יְרֵח֥וֹ <S%H3405><s%> them to Jericho עִיר־ <S%H5892><s%> the city הַתְּמָרִ֖ים <S%H8558><s%> of palm אֵ֣צֶל <S%H681><s%> to אֲחֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H251><s%> their brethren וַיָּשׁ֖וּבוּ <S%H7725><s%> then they returned שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <S%H8111><s%> to Samaria פ

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At that time הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he שָׁלַ֞ח <S%H7971><s%> send הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> did king אָחָ֛ז <S%H271><s%> Ahaz עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> unto מַלְכֵ֥י <S%H4428><s%> unto the kings אַשּׁ֖וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria לַעְזֹ֥ר <S%H5826><s%> to help לֽוֹ׃

וְע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> again אֲדוֹמִ֖ים <S%H130><s%> For again the Edomites בָּ֑אוּ <S%H935><s%> had come וַיַּכּ֥וּ <S%H5221><s%> and smitten בִיהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וַיִּשְׁבּוּ־ <S%H7617><s%> and carried away שֶֽׁבִי׃ <S%H7628><s%> captives

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֣ים <S%H6430><s%> The Philistines פָּשְׁט֗וּ <S%H6584><s%> also had invaded בְּעָרֵ֨י <S%H5892><s%> the cities הַשְּׁפֵלָ֣ה <S%H8219><s%> of the low country וְהַנֶּגֶב֮ <S%H5045><s%> and of the south לִֽיהוּדָה֒ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וַֽ֠יִּלְכְּדוּ <S%H3920><s%> and had taken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּֽית־ שֶׁ֨מֶשׁ <S%H1053><s%> Bethshemesh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַיָּל֜וֹן <S%H357><s%> and Ajalon וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגְּדֵר֗וֹת <S%H1450><s%> and Gederoth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שׂוֹכ֤וֹ <S%H7755><s%> and Shocho וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H1323><s%> with the villages וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תִּמְנָ֣ה <S%H8553><s%> thereof and Timnah וּבְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <S%H1323><s%> with the villages וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גִּמְז֖וֹ <S%H1579><s%> thereof Gimzo וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֹתֶ֑יהָ <S%H1323><s%> also and the villages וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> thereof and they dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <S%H8033><s%> there

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הִכְנִ֤יעַ <S%H3665><s%> low יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> For the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah בַּעֲב֖וּר <S%H5668><s%> because אָחָ֣ז <S%H271><s%> because of Ahaz מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for הִפְרִ֙יעַ֙ <S%H6544><s%> naked בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> Judah וּמָע֥וֹל <S%H4603><s%> and transgressed מַ֖עַל <S%H4604><s%> sore בַּיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD

וַיָּבֹ֣א <S%H935><s%> came עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> against תִּלְּגַ֥ת פִּלְנְאֶ֖סֶר <S%H8407><s%> And Tilgathpilneser מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וַיָּ֥צַר <S%H6696><s%> unto him and distressed ל֖וֹ וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> instead חֲזָקֽוֹ׃ <S%H2388><s%> him but strengthened

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> Although חָלַ֤ק <S%H2505><s%> took away a portion אָחָז֙ <S%H271><s%> For Ahaz אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> [out] of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> and [out] of the house הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king וְהַשָּׂרִ֑ים <S%H8269><s%> and of the princes וַיִּתֵּן֙ <S%H5414><s%> and gave לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> [it] unto the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not לְעֶזְרָ֖ה <S%H5833><s%> but he helped לֽוֹ׃

וּבְעֵת֙ <S%H6256><s%> And in the time הָצֵ֣ר <S%H6887><s%> of his distress ל֔וֹ וַיּ֖וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> yet more לִמְע֣וֹל <S%H4603><s%> did he trespass בַּיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> this הַמֶּ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> this [is that] king אָחָֽז׃ <S%H271><s%> Ahaz

וַיִּזְבַּ֗ח <S%H2076><s%> For he sacrificed לֵֽאלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> unto the gods דַרְמֶשֶׂק֮ <S%H1834><s%> of Damascus הַמַּכִּ֣ים <S%H5221><s%> which smote בּוֹ֒ וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him and he said כִּ֠י <S%H3588><s%> Because אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> Because the gods מַלְכֵֽי־ <S%H4428><s%> of the kings אֲרָם֙ <S%H758><s%> of Syria הֵ֚ם <S%H1992><s%> like מַעְזְרִ֣ים <S%H5826><s%> help אוֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> לָהֶ֥ם אֲזַבֵּ֖חַ <S%H2076><s%> them [therefore] will I sacrifice וְיַעְזְר֑וּנִי <S%H5826><s%> to them that they may help וְהֵ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> they הָֽיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> became ל֥וֹ לְהַכְשִׁיל֖וֹ <S%H3782><s%> me But they were the ruin וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of him and of all Israel

וַיֶּאֱסֹ֨ף <S%H622><s%> gathered together אָחָ֜ז <S%H271><s%> And Ahaz אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> the vessels בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיְקַצֵּץ֙ <S%H7112><s%> and cut in pieces אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כְּלֵ֣י <S%H3627><s%> the vessels בֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיִּסְגֹּ֖ר <S%H5462><s%> and shut up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דַּלְת֣וֹת <S%H1817><s%> the doors בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> and he made ל֧וֹ מִזְבְּח֛וֹת <S%H4196><s%> him altars בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every פִּנָּ֖ה <S%H6438><s%> in every corner בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem

וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> every עִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> And in every several city וָעִ֤יר <S%H5892><s%> city לִֽיהוּדָה֙ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah עָשָׂ֣ה <S%H6213><s%> he made בָמ֔וֹת <S%H1116><s%> high places לְקַטֵּ֖ר <S%H6999><s%> to burn incense לֵֽאלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֑ים <S%H312><s%> unto other וַיַּכְעֵ֕ס <S%H3707><s%> and provoked to anger אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> of his fathers

וְיֶ֤תֶר <S%H3499><s%> Now the rest דְּבָרָיו֙ <S%H1697><s%> of his acts וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all דְּרָכָ֔יו <S%H1870><s%> and of all his ways הָרִאשֹׁנִ֖ים <S%H7223><s%> first וְהָאַחֲרוֹנִ֑ים <S%H314><s%> and last הִנָּ֣ם <S%H2005><s%> behold כְּתוּבִ֔ים <S%H3789><s%> behold they [are] written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book מַלְכֵֽי־ <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> and Israel

וַיִּשְׁכַּ֨ב <S%H7901><s%> slept אָחָ֜ז <S%H271><s%> And Ahaz עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with אֲבֹתָ֗יו <S%H1><s%> with his fathers וַֽיִּקְבְּרֻ֤הוּ <S%H6912><s%> and they buried בָעִיר֙ <S%H5892><s%> him in the city בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> [even] in Jerusalem כִּ֚י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> did not הֱבִיאֻ֔הוּ <S%H935><s%> but they brought לְקִבְרֵ֖י <S%H6913><s%> him not into the sepulchres מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned יְחִזְקִיָּ֥הֽוּ <S%H2396><s%> and Hezekiah בְנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son תַּחְתָּֽיו׃ <S%H8478><s%> his place פ
